name: 123 Kids Puzzles
description:
Play Free Games on:
http://www.myarcadegames.net

123 Kids Puzzles is very fun puzzle game for kids 2+ there is in total 123 puzzles -30 Easy puzzles -70 Normal puzzles -23 Hard puzzles Very fun and beautiful puzzles for kids 2+! Your child will love 123 Kids Puzzles, with beautiful random kids pictures + fun background music. Puzzles range from 3 to 7 pieces, and you can choose the difficulty.

• 123 Kids puzzle levels
• Fun balloon celebrations when a puzzle is finished
• Change difficulty to easy, normal or hard
• Hours of entertainment for your child!
• Very Fun for children 2+
• Great music

Privacy Policy-
This app:
- Does not contain ads
- Does not contain links to social networks or any website
- Does not use data collection tools
